title: UAP Disclosure Act (2023–2025): text, what survived, and documented pushback
summary: Original Schumer–Rounds proposals (incl. eminent domain over recovered technologies/biological evidence), what actually became law in Dec 2023, and public pushback—linked to official PDFs and nonpartisan funding data.

title: Pre-Sputnik satellite-like tracks on historical plates (Villarroel et al.)
summary: Peer-reviewed analyses of mid-20th-century astronomical plates report satellite-like tracks before Sputnik; authors call for replication and strict artefact controls.

title: Alleged 1933 Italy recovered craft (referenced in later testimony)
summary: Historical claims and archival references concerning a purported recovered craft in Italy; page collates documents, provenance, and later witness references.

title: Sworn testimony to lawmakers regarding UAP programs (2023–2025)
summary: Three House hearings (2023, 2024, 2025) with under-oath testimony; links to official videos, transcripts, and written statements.

title: FOIA & archival releases relevant to UAP (selected)
summary: UK/US official repositories and key releases with guidance for targeted requests and verification.

title: Instrumented encounters with radar/visual corroboration (selected cases)
summary: Official Navy/DoD releases (FLIR1, GIMBAL, GOFAST) and AARO imagery with data-leads for independent verification.
